main event: A bright yellowish-green object appeared as a ball of fire with a tail of fire, falling straight down in Karlsruhe, Germany.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 10 seconds., The tail of fire was reported to be 4 to 5 times the diameter of the object., The reported course of the object was straight downward., Another pilot from the same organization also observed the phenomenon., The initial appearance was as a small light that suddenly grew larger before dropping below the horizon.
sighted object: a bright yellowish-green ball of fire
witness description: Capt William L. Mathews and Capt Glenn M. Johnson, both from the 461st Tacfitron
